attributes.action: declare a national holiday to allow folk across the country to join Neil and Emma in celebrating the joyous event of their marriage on July 15th 2007...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I (Neil) am marrying a beautiful girl called Emma on July 15th 2007... And I feel everyone should get a chance to celebrate with me... I reckon that as the wedding is a Sunday, there should be a holiday on the monday (the 16th), thereby giving everyone a nice long weekend... How about it Tony? Or Gordon as it will probably be by then...

rejection.details: ... but we do all send our best wishes for the wedding.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
